item.title: Why Buy a Used Cell Phone?
item.description:
Many people associate buying a cell phone with starting new service or upgrading their existing contract. However, there are situations where buying a new phone might not be the ideal solution. New cell phones come with a hefty price tag, either requiring a significant upfront payment or a two-year contract commitment to receive a discount or free phone from the carrier. Wanting a different phone before the contract ends usually means committing to another two years or paying the full, potentially exorbitant, price for a new one...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/why-buy-a-used-cell-phone/

item.title: Cell Phone Family Plans for Professionals
item.description:
Typically, “family plans” bring to mind adding lines for children. However, in the current economic climate, a family plan could be the difference between two working individuals each having a dedicated phone and being forced to share. Sharing a phone is impractical for business, so let’s explore these family plans further. You might not have considered this option for professional use due to the name “family plan.” These plans are more accurately described as shared minutes plans, but the name “family plan” has stuck, so we’ll use it here...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cell-phone-family-plans-for-professionals/

item.title: Will a Refurbished Smartphone Meet Your Needs?
item.description:
Placing your phone on top of your car alongside your coffee is never advisable. Distractions happen, like thinking about a meeting, and before you know it, you’ve driven off, leaving your belongings behind. The sound of your phone hitting the pavement as it falls off the car might be audible or not. Meanwhile, your coffee has stained your car window. Losing your phone is a financial headache. Why? Because now you’re paying for an expensive service plan with no device to use it...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/will-a-refurbished-smartphone-meet-your-needs/

item.title: Add International Capability To Your Cell Phone
item.description:
The increasing popularity of wireless phones allows mobile professionals to stay connected consistently. However, international calls remain a challenge due to expensive rates. Fortunately, there’s a solution: international dial-around services. These services, such as TEL3Advantage, seamlessly integrate with existing cell phone plans. Essentially, they allow users to make international calls at significantly reduced rates by routing them through the dial-around service instead of their regular carrier. For example, TEL3Advantage offers a rate of 1...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/add-international-capability-to-your-cell-phone/
